widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (350, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (360, 7), size = (310, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1)], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD", 22)], "itemHeight": 35 }

skin.screen:
Default
Format: %A
Format: %e. %B
{"templates": {"default": (105,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (10,15),size = (100,75),png = 4),# index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,10),size = (550,30),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,40),size = (290,30),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 5),# index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,70),size = (290,30),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 6),# index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (410,40),size = (255,30),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 7),# index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (410,70),size = (255,30),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 8),# index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (105,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,10),size = (655,30),font=2,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 0),# index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,40),size = (655,50),font=3,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD",22),gFont("SetrixHD",18),gFont("SetrixHD",26),gFont("SetrixHD",20)], "itemHeight": 105 }
# fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing,currently there is no other way doing this.

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (460, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER , text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 0), size = (180, 27), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1 are the rtesults ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD", 22),gFont("SetrixHD", 18)], "itemHeight": 27 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 3), size = (250, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (270, 3), size = (180, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (460, 3), size = (100, 24), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (570, 3), size = (90, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD", 22),gFont("SetrixHD", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }

skin.screen:
Default
Format: %A
Format: %e. %B
{"templates": {"default": (130,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 0), size = (180, 130), png = 0), # index 0 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (180, 0), size = (180, 130), png = 1), # index 0 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (360, 0), size = (180, 130), png = 2), # index 0 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (540, 0), size = (180, 130), png = 3), # index 0 is the thumbnail ]), "state": (130,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 35), size = (740, 65), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD", 20),gFont("SetrixHD", 14),gFont("SetrixHD", 28)], "itemHeight": 130 }

eLabel.text: E n h a n c e d M o v i e C e n t e r

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,5),size = (120,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 0 is the MenuText, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (130,5),size = (25,25),png = 2),# index 1 i direction pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160,5),size = (270,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# index 2 is remote name/number MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440,5),size = (60,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# index 3 is length of call MultiContentEntryText(pos = (510,5),size = (225,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER,text = 5),# index 4 is my number/name for number ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",18)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,5),size = (320,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 0 is the name,index 1 is shortname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (340,5),size = (360,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# index 2 is number ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 35 }
